code:
-spec beautiful_substrings(S :: unicode:unicode_binary(), K :: integer()) -> integer().
beautiful_substrings(S, K) ->
    SLen = byte_size(S),
    IsVowel = fun(C) -> lists:member(C, [<<"a">>, <<"e">>, <<"i">>, <<"o">>, <<"u">>]) end,
    CountBeautiful = fun
        CountBeautiful(_, J, Acc) when J > SLen -> Acc;
        CountBeautiful(I, J, Acc) ->
            SubStr = binary:part(S, {I-1, J-I+1}),
            Vowels = length([Char || <<Char:8/binary>> <= SubStr, IsVowel(<<Char>>)]),
            Consonants = (J-I+1) - Vowels,
            NewAcc = case (Vowels == Consonants) andalso ((Vowels * Consonants) rem K == 0) of
                true -> Acc + 1;
                false -> Acc
            end,
            CountBeautiful(I, J+1, NewAcc)
    end,
    OuterLoop = fun
        OuterLoop(N, Acc) when N > SLen -> Acc;
        OuterLoop(N, Acc) ->
            NewAcc = CountBeautiful(N, N, Acc),
            OuterLoop(N+1, NewAcc)
    end,
    OuterLoop(1, 0).
